tool_description: Analyzes electrical grid network topology, transmission capacities, and interconnections between grid segments to understand power flow constraints.

include_transmission_limits.description: Whether to include transmission line capacity limits

voltage_levels.description: Voltage levels to include in analysis (kV)

analysis_depth.description: Analysis depth: basic, detailed, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid grid region: Specified region not found in topology database.
Invalid voltage levels: Voltage levels must be positive integers representing kV.
Invalid analysis depth: Use basic, detailed, or comprehensive.
Topology data incomplete: Some transmission line data missing for specified region.
usage: Provide grid_region identifier. Optionally set include_transmission_limits, voltage_levels array, and analysis_depth. Returns network topology data and transmission constraints.

segment_count.description: Number of grid segments in the region

interconnection_points.description: List of major interconnection point identifiers
